description: Business issues in relation to database management, conceptual modelling & data modelling in business applications. Using structured Query Language (SQL) to uncover critical information for business decision making. Applications of database systems in a business context.
prerequisites: BISM1201 or MGTS1201 or 2 units COMP/COMS/INFS courses
incompatible: INFS1200 or 7900 or BISM7206 or MGTS3203 or MGTS7206
